need one half of a large onion finely
diced
one bunch of fresh asparagus just simply
snap the tough ends off and discard

now finally dice the clove of garlic but

it will all mix nice and even once

my badge is all prepped now one more

add three tablespoons of olive oil to a

it'll take about 4-5 minutes now we'll

now we can start the process of adding

adding the broth slowly remember you're
not whipping up a Marais take your time
stir it slowly you want to get all that

take your time it'll come out nice and

and stir it in gently
